updateElements.mainHeader: Your Mac requires a System and Security update
updateElements.subHeader: A friendly reminder from the Millikin University department of Information Technology
updateElements.mainContentText:
A fully up-to-date device is required to ensure that IT can accurately maintain and protect your device.

To begin the update, click on the 'Update Device' button and Install the available updates shown within the 'Software Update' window.

You may be required accept an update license agreement or enter your macOS Credentials to apply the update.

If you have any issues, please contact the Millikin University IT Help Desk.

IT Help Desk Hours: Monday - Friday - 8 A.M. to 4:30 P.M.

IT Help Desk Phone Number: (217) 362-6488

IT Help Desk Email: infotech@millikin.edu
